# transport

**Instance Property**

The data transport for the device.

## Declaration

```swift
let transport: HIDDeviceTransport?
```

## Discussion

The data transport is typically [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDDeviceTransport/virtual], but it can be any [doc://com.apple.CoreHID/documentation/CoreHID/HIDDeviceTransport].
